name: Belfast GameCraft 2014 - Postcards From the Future
name_original: Belfast GameCraft 2014 - Postcards From the Future
description:
The Curious Case of the Gentleman Sending Postcards Home to His Yesterself

Single room, locked room puzzle game created for Belfast GameCraft 2014:

You're trapped in a locked room, you receive a postcard from your future self with a hint on how to escape.... good luck!

Controlled with WASD/Up,Down,Left,Right
Hint by walking over the postcard in the bottom left.
Knock your choice of slime character into the top of the Pandara's Box!
G resets the level.
Walk up through the top of the region when you've successfully deposited the correct creature into the box for the ending.
Refresh the page when done to play again (there's only one room currently tho :( so once finished you've completed it for now!)
